title: League of Legends is not opening
body: So I've been playing for about three months now and everything was fine. Then out of nowhere my client just stops opening, I check task manager and it says that it is open but the app is not there. I tried re-downloading it several times but it never works. I even tried the hextech repair tool but it didn't help at all. Can someone help explain what is going on exactly?

replies.body: Some OS update or change in security settings might be preventing your patcher or client from launching.  You should go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that access restored.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I tried all of the steps but it didn't work so I submitted a ticket with all of the information about my system.

To be honest I'm having the same issues, been trying to enter. I was about to start a game and it didn't let me play and I try reconnecting and doesn't let me. 

Already did administrator, Hextech repair and nothing. But I check internet and that is not it because it lets me play WoW.

This sounds like a different situation than the OP, and could be caused by a connection problem.  More specifically, your network might be having trouble reaching the game server so the loading screen might not show or comes up as a black screen.  Try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Test it in a custom game, and let me know if it helps!

I did. But just lets me enter the Log in screen and after I connect says something went wrong and I try again just stays loading.

May reinstalling the game will work?
